Question: At age 41, this person had a net worth of $340 million and replaced Bill Cosby as the only African American on the Forbes 400.
Hints: This person once commented that she had chosen not to be a mother because she had not been mothered well.
According to the Harris poll, this person was America's favorite television personality in 1998, 2000, 2002–2006, and 2009.
Nelson Mandela praised this person for overcoming her own disadvantaged youth to become a benefactor for others.
